Title: The Good Samaritan (No. 106)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Brandon Margolis, Brandon Sonnier, Jason George (executive story editor), Amanda Kate Shuman (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: A serial killer from Liz's past strikes again while Red hunts for his betrayer.
